dialogues.name: Kent
dialogues.dialogueText: What? You’re crazy Meda. There aren’t any pir--

dialogues.name: Kent
dialogues.dialogueText: Meda, there are pirates! Why didn’t you tell us before?

dialogues.name: Meda
dialogues.dialogueText: We’re on a pirate ship!! A plank on the port side, cannons on the starboard.There’s no doubt about it!

dialogues.name: Meda
dialogues.dialogueText: *sigh* The right side of the ship. What are we going to do?

dialogues.name: Kent
dialogues.dialogueText: Awww! Looks like the babies are playing their baby games again. Heh… I suppose I’ll play along with your “Pirate Ship.”

dialogues.name: Jade
dialogues.dialogueText: Well, I’m excited to fight some pirates!

dialogues.name: Meda
dialogues.dialogueText: All I know is that this means we’re somewhere in the Caribbean sea.

dialogues.name: Kent
dialogues.dialogueText: And how exactly would you know that?

dialogues.name: Meda
dialogues.dialogueText: Because when you are busy being a jerk to Ed, I read. And one of my books was about the seven seas.

dialogues.name: Ed
dialogues.dialogueText: Meda is right. We are on a pirate ship.

dialogues.name: Kent
dialogues.dialogueText: Well well well! Look who decided to speak up. So, how about that lunch money?

dialogues.name: Jade
dialogues.dialogueText: Hush Kent. Now’s not the time. Ed, how do you know all this is real?
